description: Yarrow (Achillea millefolium) is an amazing plant species that can be found growing in a variety of places including roadsides, fields, and even in your garden. Yarrow has many incredible properties, such as its ability to attract pollinators, its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial attributes, and its hardy nature. It is a perennial flowering herb, which means it can survive many climates and resist drought conditions; this makes it a great choice for anyone looking for an easy care plant for their garden. Yarrow also has medicinal uses, and is great for soothing upset stomachs or providing relief from colds and flu. All around, yarrow is a fantastic plant that offers a wide range of benefits and is well worth adding to your garden!
